item.title: AWS CDK(v2) BatchSubmitJob in StepFunctions to dynamically overwrite commands from Context and Input
item.description: Introduction When executing AWSBatch from StepFunctions in AWS CDK, it is convenient to use BatchSubmitJob, but I could not find out how to overwrite containerOverrides.command, so I have written it down. Version aws-cdk: 2.20.0 How to dynamically overwrite command from Context or Input with BatchSubmitJob There is a aws_stepfunctions.JsonPath, and if string[] is an expected parameter, you can use JsonPath.listAt(JSON_PATH).
